thread.title: Live the Hobbit life with these houses straight out of The Shire (9 photos)
thread.title_full: Live the Hobbit life with these houses straight out of The Shire (9 photos)

author: Alex
title: Live the Hobbit life with these houses straight out of The Shire (9 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
The life of a hobbit is sweet. Just frolicking in fields and combing your feet and chiefing your pipe all day. Sure, there’s the occasional wizard who will come along and drag you on a terrifying and suicidal mission to save the entire world from unspeakable evil, but aside from that, it’s a pretty chill situation. And now, you too can carve out your own slice of Middle Earth. 
Green Magic Homes offers these durable, waterproof, arched structures that are made to be covered in soil and whatever plant life you’d find in a backyard. They’re surprisingly affordable — just $41 per square foot — and the Florida company says the shell huts are easy to construct. 2
